title: "Magnetic Water and Objects for Healing"
first_phrase: In the previous section, the author explained how to prepare water by magnetizing it with either the left or right hand. Now, the author suggests an experiment using the magnetized water on plants. Three pots of identical plants are labeled with "left hand," "right hand," and "neutral," respectively. Then, the pot labeled "left hand" is watered with the magnetized water from the left hand, the pot labeled "right hand" is watered with magnetized water from the right hand, and the pot labeled "neutral" is watered with regular water. The author suggests observing the growth of the plants to determine if the magnetized water has any effect. This section also mentions "magnetic aids."
